alert.note: Alert for Finney; Hamilton; Kearny (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Watch issued January 12 at 2:54AM CST until January 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ THIS EVENING TO 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ SUNDAY... ...WIND CHILL WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. For the Wind Chill Watch, dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Hamilton, Kearny and Finney Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ this morning. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ this evening to 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ Sunday. For the Wind Chill Watch, from Sunday evening through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
